CustomField.formula:
IF(Not(isblank(Contact__r.User_Lookup__c)) && Not(ISBLANK( Contact__r.User_Lookup__r.Requested_Invite_Date__c)) && ISBLANK(Contact__r.User_Lookup__r.Community_User_First_Login__c)&& Contact__r.User_Lookup__r.IsActive , 'Invited',

If(Not(isblank(Contact__r.User_Lookup__c)) &&Not(Contact__r.User_Lookup__r.IsActive), 'Unenrolled/no longer in Program', NULL)))
